nominalLexeme: 1. A piece of material which hangs from the top of a window. You pull it across the window when you want to keep light out or prevent people from seeing you. English = curtain, curtains. American English = drapes.
2. In a theatre, the large piece of material that hangs in front of the stage until a performance begins. English = curtain.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the lines gathered material of a curtain.
